name: Espionage
short_description:
This is an open source game currently in planning stages being written in Java, that is loosely based off of the excellent "Covert Action" released in 1990.
You are a secret agent serving a government of your choice and you are responsible for bringing down some of the biggest criminal plots

The plan is to have a visually appealing functional game, in it's early stages there is no graphical interface or feedback and is entirely text driven. Sometime in the future a functional GUI is planned and then after that art assets can be implemented to create a more visually appealing and enjoyable game.

Support is planned for Windows, Linux, Mac. Ports to mobile devices are a possibility but not currently planned.
summary: A game loosely based on the 1990 game by Sid Meier "Covert Action"
